mapper.select: select distinct p.id,p.parent_id,p.name,p.label,p.code,p.url,p.type, p.icon,p.remark,p.path,p.is_home,p.order_num from sys_user as u left join sys_user_role as ur on u.id = ur.user_id left join sys_role as r on ur.role_id = r.id left join sys_role_permission as rp on rp.role_id = r.id left join sys_permission as p on rp.permission_id = p.id where u.id =#{userId} order by p.order_num asc
select distinct p.* from sys_permission as p join sys_role_permission as rp on p.id = rp.permission_id join sys_role as sr on rp.role_id = sr.id where rp.role_id =#{roleId}
